title: Smart (marque)
summary: Smart (stylized as smart)[1] is a German automotive brand and division of Daimler AG. The marque is based in BÃ¶blingen, Germany. It produces microcars and subcompacts, primarily the Fortwo and Forfour. The primary assembly plant is the Smartville in Hambach, France. Renault-owned Revoz, based in Novo Mesto, Slovenia, has also assembled Smart vehicles. Smart is marketed in 46[2] countries around the world, and production of the Fortwo had surpassed 1.7 million units by early 2015.[3][4][5]
